text: Point Roberts is an census-designated place (CDP) of Whatcom County in the state of Washington in the United States. It is an American exclave located on the southern border with Canada. https://www.latimes.com/archives/la- xpm-2002-jun-09-adna-point-story.html == References == Category:Census- designated places in Washington (state) Category:Exclaves
title: Point Roberts, Washington
